flashtype: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
shutterspeeds: 1/2000-1 sec. 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
imagestabilization: Electronic VR (still pictures) Motion Detection (still pictures)
waterproof: Up to a depth of 5m and for 60 minutes
scenemodes: Close Up Continuous Shooting Diorama Effect Fireworks Show Food Interval Shooting Mirror Underwater Soft
meteringsystem: Matrix Centre-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x) Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
continuousshooting: Up to 4 shots at approx. 1.5 frames per second
exposuresettings: Programmed auto exposure (shutter speed, ND filter selection and ISO sensitivity)
